column4: i once had a folder that was called public_html  and it was able to be treated as an apache htdocs folder(basically, u could go to it through the internet to view web pages saved in it)   now i dont think its connected to internet....how do i check to see if it is?
anyone know the key combination that i can press so my home directory will list all the hidden folders?????
if you do gnome-open /path/you/want/to/open it will open the folder. If you want to open it with root permissions you can do gksu gnome-open /path/for/thing
